content.rendered:
Padel Courts Now Open!

LOCATED INSIDE THE PRECINCT, ADJACENT TO WATERFALL CITY – WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS

Indawo Lifestyle Apartments is conveniently located inside The Precinct and adjacent to Waterfall City. Situated in close proximity to retail nodes, corporate parks and many different educational facilities. Indawo Lifestyle Apartments boasts stunning fittings and finishes along with feature walls, gas hob and a solar backup solution. The secure gatehouse is manned 24/7 by highly trained, friendly security guards. The Lifestyle Hub has a swimming pool, fully-equipped gym, Super Splash Water Park and a restaurant. It’s time to #MakeHoussYourHome

Contact Wayne
Contact Phathi
Contact Zanele
Contact Wandile
Contact Terence
Contact Blessing
BROCHURE
ESTATE LOCATION
ESTATE VIDEO
ESTATE RULES

ESTATE FEATURES

3-bed, 2-bed and two 1-bed apartments for rent
Sizes range from 32m² – 83m²
Rent from R6,900pm – R13,700pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Solar backup and gas hobs
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Tennis Court
Padel Courts
Swimming Pool
Super Splash Water Park
Multipurpose Sports Fields

INDOOR FACILITIES

Family Restaurant
Fully-Equipped Gym
Sky Bar
Meeting Rooms
Laundromat

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

INDAWO IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
